SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.service

Class AuthorizationCodeService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.service.AuthorizationCodeService
@Service public class AuthorizationCodeService extends Object
Service for handling authorization codes and validating them against user roles. This service maintains a set of predefined authorization codes mapped to specific user roles. It provides functionality to validate if a given authorization code is valid for a requested role.

Note: In a real-world application, authorization codes should be stored securely in a database rather than hardcoded in the application.

Example usage:

 
 AuthorizationCodeService authService = new AuthorizationCodeService();
 boolean isValid = authService.isValidAuthCode("ADMIN2025", UserRole.ADMIN);

Dependencies:

  • Map
  • HashMap
  • UserRole

    • isValidAuthCode

      public boolean isValidAuthCode(String authCode, UserRole requestedRole)
      Validates if the provided authorization code is valid for the requested role.
      Parameters:
      authCode - The authorization code provided during registration
      requestedRole - The role the user is attempting to register for
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid for the requested role, false otherwise
